pr_title: [#1050] Register Parameter Resolvers in Test Fixtures

timeline.message:
Introduce registerParameterResolverFactory

Introduce a method to the FixtureConfiguration which allows the
registration of custom ParameterResolverFactories. This method should be
 regarded as a more extensive option of the registerResources method

#1050

Introduce registerParameterResolverFactory

Introduce a method to the FixtureConfiguration which allows the
registration of custom ParameterResolverFactories. This method should be
 regarded as a more extensive option of the registerResources method

#1050

timeline.bodyText: Just a weird javadoc identation/new line here.
timeline.author: lfgcampos
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -160,16 +162,28 @@ /** * Registers a resource that is eligible for injection in handler method (e.g. methods annotated with {@link - * CommandHandler @CommandHandler}, {@link - * EventSourcingHandler @EventSourcingHandler} and {@link - * EventHandler @EventHandler}. These resource must be - * registered before registering any command handler. + * CommandHandler @CommandHandler}, {@link EventSourcingHandler @EventSourcingHandler} and {@link EventHandler * - * @param resource The resource eligible for injection + * @param resource the resource eligible for injection * @return the current FixtureConfiguration, for fluent interfacing + * @EventHandler}. These resource must be registered before registering any command handler.

timeline.message:
Replace ArrayList for LinkedList

We want the registered ParameterResolverFactories to be first in the
list. To achieve this, a LinkedList should be used instead of an
ArrayList, as this class provides an addFirst(Object) method.

#1050

Fix javadoc indentation issue

Fix javadoc indentation issue

#1050

timeline.bodyText: should that's a pretty weak guarantee :)
timeline.author: m1l4n54v1c

replies.bodyText: Lol, fair enough. Changed to will. However, it obviously depends on the actual implementation if it "will". Guess that's why I did should in the first place.
replies.author: smcvb
